definition: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, US comic book series, first appeared in 1984, also films, video games etc
to bear/to endure/to tolerate/to restrain oneself

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Who was your favourite Ninja Turtle?
sentences.chinese: 你最喜欢的忍者神龟是谁？

sentences.english: But didn't you tell him how weird things have gotten with the Turtles?
sentences.chinese: 但是你跟他说了忍者神龟们变的多奇怪了吗？

sentences.english: I was slowly becoming a real food ninja in the super market.
sentences.chinese: 在超市，我逐渐修炼成了一名真正食物的忍者神龟。

sentences.english: Dan: No, this is the entire contents from my Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle piggy bank.
sentences.chinese: 没有，这是我储在忍者神龟钱罐里的所有积蓄。

sentences.english: This is the entire contents from my teenage mutant ninja turtle piggy bank.
sentences.chinese: 这是我的忍者神龟储罐里的所有积蓄。
你最喜欢的忍者神龟是谁？

sentences.english: Do you remember the Ninjie Turtles we watched as kids?
sentences.chinese: 记得我们小时候看的连播卡通《忍者神龟》吗？

definition: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (Tw)/see 忍者神龜|忍者神龟[Ren3 zhe3 Shen2 gui1]
Dragon Ball, Japanese manga and anime series
